channel.title: Fourm Help?
channel.description: Hello Im Making a Fourm Im Asking How Do you Make add reps its post right now but i want reps[br][size=1]Posted on: April 15, 2007, 10:52:25 AM[/size][hr]Help ???

item.title: Fourm Help?
item.dc:creator: @Tree Tree
item.description:
@Tree wrote:

First you must find out which software you are using (phpbb, vbulletin, smf and other such ones). This information can be found at the bottem of the forum (Footer).

If its smf all youhave to do is enable it in Admin CP, as mentionedf above.
If it’s vbulletin i believe it’s the same way (?)
If it’s phpbb then things get hard. You will have to google EzyMod and then the mod to install karma.

Read full topic

item.title: Fourm Help?
item.dc:creator: @therealjdb JDB`
item.description:
@therealjdb wrote:

Enable the Karma setting in Admin CP.

Read full topic
